name: Cubicorner
description:
Cubicorner is a minimalist puzzle game, that is loaded with relaxing music and sounds.

The rules are simple: Collect all gems on the board and reach the exit. In Cubicorner players take direct control of the cube and roll their way around the game's dozens of levels.

Based on that, there are many unique and beautiful levels that brings you a collection of challenging puzzles.Key Features:
  • Retro styled platformer
  • 70 beautiful and unique puzzle levels
  • Relaxing music
  • 100+ Achievements
  • Simple keyboard arrow controls

Thank you for playing and supporting this game!!
